'''Frozen: Anna & Elsa Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Tweet|Noxcrew|1775210665575141443|Channel your inner snow queen and keep your wardrobe refreshed with the new Frozen: Anna & Elsa Skin Pack! ❄️ Out now on the Minecraft Marketplace! ⬇️}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 23 skins of {{Wikipedia|Anna (Frozen)|Anna}} and {{Wikipedia|Elsa (Frozen)|Elsa}} from the ''{{Wikipedia|Frozen (franchise)|Frozen}}'' media franchise by ''Disney''. It was created by Noxcrew, who previously made an [[Frozen (map)|adventure map]] based on the same property.
